Class Turtle

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
game_app.Sprites
game_app.Turtle
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Turtle
extends Sprites
REFACTOR:

. self encapsulating field to avoid direct access of field even within own class
. create setter and getter for encapsulated field
. remove unused field and unused import packages
. constructor in default access

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void act​(long now)
    ? move according to speed set
    ? reset x coordinate to -200 if more than 600 while moving to right
    ? reset x coordinate to 600 if less than -75 while moving to left
    EXTENSION:
    ? added animation for turtles to swim in left to right direction,
    ? original code only has right to left animation

  • Constructor Details

    • Turtle

      Turtle​(int xpos, int ypos, int s, int w, int h, int dir)
      ? Construct turtles sprites
      ? EXTENSION: added new parameter dir to determine movement direction
      Parameters:
      xpos - : x coordinate to put sprite
      ypos - : y coordinate to put sprite
      s - : speed value to put sprite
      w - : width for sprite
      h - : height for sprite
      dir - : direction in which sprite move

  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act​(long now)
      ? move according to speed set
      ? reset x coordinate to -200 if more than 600 while moving to right
      ? reset x coordinate to 600 if less than -75 while moving to left
      EXTENSION:
      ? added animation for turtles to swim in left to right direction,
      ? original code only has right to left animation
      Overrides:
      act in class Sprites
      Parameters:
      now - : parameter of type long

    • moveLeft

      public boolean moveLeft()
      EXTENSION: method to determine movement direction of sprite
      Returns:
      boolean : condition flag to determine turtles moving to left

    • setSpeed

      public void setSpeed​(int sp)

      public void setTurtlesRL​(int w0, int h0)

      Parameters:
      w0 - : width of image
      h0 - : height of image

      public void setTurtlesLR​(int w0, int h0)
